How To:
------------------------
-Drag the map into your C:/Program Files/Steam/Steam Apps/*accountname*/counterstrike source/cstrike/maps

-If you are running a dedicated server and can't bhop put -tickrate 100 in your "Set Launch Options"

-For better bhoping put sv_airaccelerate 100 in your console.
------------------------

Can you beat NOOB?!

At the end where it says MAP BY COLOSSAL find the switch to get to the beginning.
